name: Action Police Car Parking Simulator 3D - Real Test Driving Game
name_original: Action Police Car Parking Simulator 3D - Real Test Driving Game
description:
Welcome to The Police Car Parking Academy. Now here's your chance! Test drive and master your skills by parking various Police Cars in this Ultimate Parking Obstacle Course. Real steering and real handling. Is that something you can do?

Choose from different camera views to get the right angle while not damaging your car. We give you lives but they will be lost easily if your driving is off. Play again until you've master your skills over and over.

[Game Features]
- Beautifully crafted 3D graphics.
- 30 Levels, Challenging, try for yourself
- Multiple environments: Play during the Morning, After Dark, or Snowy
- Variety of Police Cars, Ambulances, Police Trucks, Police Vans and more

[Power-ups]
- Weather Control
- Wheel Sets
- Extra Lives
- Repair kits
and more..

Play Action Police Car Parking Simulator 3D - Real Test Driving Game today!

PLEASE NOTE:
- This game is free to play but in app purchases charges real money within the app. You can adjust your device settings to lock out in app purchasing.
